location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 8 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a duplicate communication (No 19) concerning a complaint made against Mr Babcock, the Company's Agent at Muscat, by Goolaub Amendass. It notes that all affected parties have been informed that the agent is not to use his position to prejudice any proceedings brought against him.
